newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Index up, volume down on Estonian bourse.
newsitem.headline: Index up, volume down on Estonian bourse.

text.p: Volume fell steeply while the index climbed at Estonia's bourse on Friday, the Tallinn Stock Exchange said.
Overall market volume was just 3.4 million kroons compared with 8.2 million kroons Thursday and the index rose 0.16 percent to 97.95.
Forex Bank was the most active listing with 1.1 million kroons worth of its shares traded and it closed at 78.00 kroons compared with 77.50 kroons on Thursday.
Estonia's emerging market economy is regarded as the most dynamic in the former Soviet Union and analysts anticipate its infant bourse will continue to pick up steam as the economy grows.
